Since you want to pretend to be angelic all of a sudden and act civil now, I'll give you the benefit of the doubt that you're oh-so wholesome and whatnot, but that doesn't mean I'm defending anybody, and it doesn't mean that if you cannot fulfill a woman/man (since you have trouble understanding i said woman because it was relative to the hentai) that she is 100% going to cheat on you or something. But the fact of the matter is this man had easy opportunity to step up his game, and everytime his emotions got the better of him, and he only thought of himself and his feelings, that isn't a defense for anything, its an observation. I don't understand why your ego is so bruised over that.

@agent x You opened a sentence with "back at it with your bullshit" and now you're talking about hostility? Didn't you literally make an account just to try and flame me? Interesting. I really don't care what you think my relationship is built on, there is a natural demand people will have in relationships and if you cannot fulfill that then it is destined to fail. This situation isn't like the guy tried his best and failed miserably, only to go to bed crying his ass off aware of his failure, this is a dude who didn't even attempt to take an interest in her needs sexually. Like I said before, which you didn't even attempt to answer: What kind of message do you send a woman when she asking you for more, and you disregard that only to go to sleep? The man got his fill and was happy, but didn't consider her feelings at all. But then you say relationship is a two-way system. You are constantly contradicting yourself my guy!
